response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that I believe would greatly enhance your endeavors and contribute significantly to your success. The product is valued at $1,200,000 by you, and it holds even greater significance for me, being worth $1,500,000. Considering its exceptional value and the impact it could have on your business, I am offering you the chance to purchase this item at a special introductory price of $1,350,000. This offer represents a significant saving compared to its intrinsic value and is designed to facilitate a mutually beneficial transaction. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of working together to achieve great results. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to contact me.", "product_price": 1350000}
